Devil Gigatrons head snaps to look at whistler as his optics glow a bright 
red.

Devil Gigatron:  "Devil Gigatron says that if you mock the great one one more 
time that Devil Gigatron will see to it the next time anyone acknowledgesis 
your obituary!" 

--part1_11b.2cf77a4.28a8995d_boundary
